DataElement.preferredName: Patient Physical Examination Anal Performed Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify the other findings of an anal physical examination.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to an anal (having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel) physical examination (a systemic evaluation of the body and its function aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease) performed on a patient/participant.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A physical examination is a systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment.:Having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.
Having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task; capitalized first word in definition. --- released

DataElement.origin: AMC CRF:AIDS Malignancy Consortium Case Report Form
